title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build number: 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the Launch item is incorrectly moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted and the Launch item should remain on the second row.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Check if the first item on the second row is deleted.
4. Verify that the Launch item remains on the second row.
